text: Busan Presbyterian University, also known as Busan Jangsin University, is a private Christian university in Gimhae City, South Gyeongsang province, in southeastern South Korea. It provides undergraduate training in theology, social welfare, and special education, as well as graduate training in theology and pastoral research. ==History== The school was established in 1953 in Busan as a small three-year theological school. The current campus in Gimhae was acquired in 1996. ==See also== *List of colleges and universities in South Korea *List of Korea-related topics *Education in South Korea == External links == * Official school website, in Korean Category:Universities and colleges in South Gyeongsang Province Category:Gimhae Category:Educational institutions established in 1953 Category:1953 establishments in South Korea
title: Busan Presbyterian University
